values: A cousin is the child of one’s aunt and uncle.
My cousin looks just like me.
n.堂（表）兄弟，堂（表）姐妹

n. 堂[表]兄弟[姊妹]远亲, 同辈, 同胞

A cousin is a relative who shares a common ancestor, but who is not a sibling or direct descendant.
